Title: Avoiding the ‘Copycat Trap’ on Balochistan
Content: One of the first things beginners in chess are told to avoid is the “Copycat Trap”. In copycat play, you ‘mirror’ each of your opponent’s moves, in the hope that it will eventually frustrate the oppo
Author: Suhasini Haidar
